mapper.sql: ID, IMPORT_PERSON, IMPORT_TIME, OMS_ID, A0100, A0184, NAME, PY, SEX, CSRQ, GJ, CSDD, ZJLX, ZJXS, XPLX, ZJHM, QFJG, QFDD, QFRQ, YXQZ, SAVE_STATUS, CARD_STATUS, SURELY_UNIT, SURELY_WAY, CABINET_NUM, PLACE, COUNTER_NUM, IS_VALID, EXCEPTION_MESSAGE, EXCEPTION_CONCLUSION, EXCEPTION_HANDLER, EXCEPTION_SOLVEDATE, UPDATER, UPDATE_TIME
mapper.insert: insert into cf_certificate (ID, IMPORT_PERSON, IMPORT_TIME, OMS_ID, A0100, A0184, NAME, PY, SEX, CSRQ, GJ, CSDD, ZJLX, ZJXS, XPLX, ZJHM, QFJG, QFDD, QFRQ, YXQZ, SAVE_STATUS, CARD_STATUS, SURELY_UNIT, SURELY_WAY, CABINET_NUM, PLACE, COUNTER_NUM, IS_VALID, EXCEPTION_MESSAGE, EXCEPTION_CONCLUSION, EXCEPTION_HANDLER, EXCEPTION_SOLVEDATE, UPDATER, UPDATE_TIME) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{importPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{importTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{omsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{a0100,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{a0184,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{py,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{csrq,jdbcType=DATE}, #{gj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{csdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zjlx,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{zjxs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xplx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zjhm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qfjg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qfdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qfrq,jdbcType=DATE}, #{yxqz,jdbcType=DATE}, #{saveStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{surelyUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{surelyWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cabinetNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{counterNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isValid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{exceptionMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exceptionConclusion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exceptionHandler,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exceptionSolvedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into cf_certificate
ID,
IMPORT_PERSON,
IMPORT_TIME,
OMS_ID,
A0100,
A0184,

PY,
SEX,

GJ,

PLACE,
COUNTER_NUM,
IS_VALID,
EXCEPTION_MESSAGE,
EXCEPTION_CONCLUSION,
EXCEPTION_HANDLER,
EXCEPTION_SOLVEDATE,
UPDATER,
UPDATE_TIME,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{importPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{importTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{omsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{a0100,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{a0184,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{py,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{csrq,jdbcType=DATE},
#{gj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{csdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{zjlx,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update cf_certificate
IMPORT_PERSON = #{importPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IMPORT_TIME = #{importTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
OMS_ID = #{omsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A0100 = #{a0100,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A0184 = #{a0184,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PY = #{py,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CSRQ = #{csrq,jdbcType=DATE},
GJ = #{gj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CSDD = #{csdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZJLX = #{zjlx,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ZJXS = #{zjxs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
XPLX = #{xplx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZJHM = #{zjhm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QFJG = #{qfjg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QFDD = #{qfdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QFRQ = #{qfrq,jdbcType=DATE},
YXQZ = #{yxqz,jdbcType=DATE},
SAVE_STATUS = #{saveStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CARD_STATUS = #{cardStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SURELY_UNIT = #{surelyUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SURELY_WAY = #{surelyWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CABINET_NUM = #{cabinetNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PLACE = #{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COUNTER_NUM = #{counterNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IS_VALID = #{isValid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
EXCEPTION_MESSAGE = #{exceptionMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXCEPTION_CONCLUSION = #{exceptionConclusion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXCEPTION_HANDLER = #{exceptionHandler,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXCEPTION_SOLVEDATE = #{exceptionSolvedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update cf_certificate set IMPORT_PERSON = #{importPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IMPORT_TIME = #{importTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OMS_ID = #{omsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, A0100 = #{a0100,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, A0184 = #{a0184,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PY = #{py,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CSRQ = #{csrq,jdbcType=DATE}, GJ = #{gj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CSDD = #{csdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZJLX = #{zjlx,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ZJXS = #{zjxs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XPLX = #{xplx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZJHM = #{zjhm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QFJG = #{qfjg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QFDD = #{qfdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QFRQ = #{qfrq,jdbcType=DATE}, YXQZ = #{yxqz,jdbcType=DATE}, SAVE_STATUS = #{saveStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CARD_STATUS = #{cardStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SURELY_UNIT = #{surelyUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SURELY_WAY = #{surelyWay,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CABINET_NUM = #{cabinetNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PLACE = #{place,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COUNTER_NUM = #{counterNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_VALID = #{isValid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, EXCEPTION_MESSAGE = #{exceptionMessage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXCEPTION_CONCLUSION = #{exceptionConclusion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXCEPTION_HANDLER = #{exceptionHandler,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EXCEPTION_SOLVEDATE = #{exceptionSolvedate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT ID id, A0100 a0100 FROM oms_reg_procpersoninfo WHERE IDNUMBER_GA = #{idNo} AND CONCAT(SURNAME,NAME) = #{name}
SELECT ID id, ZJLX zjlx, ZJHM zjhm, QFRQ qfrq FROM cf_certificate WHERE A0100 =#{a0100}
SELECT ID id, ID_TYPE idType, ID_NUMBER idNumber, OGE_DATE ogeDate, OGE_TIME ogeTime FROM oms_entryexit_record WHERE A0100 =#{a0100}
SELECT NAME name, SEX sex, ZJLX zjlx, ZJHM zjhm, YXQZ yxqz, CSRQ csrq, QFJG qfjg, QFRQ qfrq, CSDD csdd FROM cf_certificate
SELECT OMS_ID omsId, NAME NAME, SEX sex, GJ gj, CSRQ csrq, ZJLX zjlx, ZJHM zjhm, QFJG qfjg, QFRQ qfrq, CSDD csdd, YXQZ yxqz FROM cf_certificate WHERE ZJLX = #{zjlx} AND ZJHM = #{zjhm}
mapper.sql: SELECT a.ID id, a.OMS_ID omsId, b.RF_B0000 rfB0000, b.WORK_UNIT workUnit, b.INCUMBENCY_STATUS incumbencyStatus, b.POST post, a. NAME NAME, a.sex sex, a.zjlx zjlx, a.zjhm zjhm, a.yxqz yxqz, a.SURELY_UNIT surelyUnit, a.SURELY_WAY surelyWay, a.CABINET_NUM cabinetNum, a.PLACE place, a.CSRQ csrq, a.qfjg qfjg, a.QFRQ qfrq, a.CSDD csdd, a.EXCEPTION_MESSAGE exceptionMessage FROM cf_certificate a INNER JOIN oms_reg_procpersoninfo b ON a.OMS_ID = b.ID
mapper.select: LEFT JOIN cf_certificate_collection c ON a.id=c.cer_id WHERE a.SAVE_STATUS = '2' AND a.CARD_STATUS = '5' AND c.CJ_STATUS is null

select cc.ID as id, cc.A0100 as a0100, op.B0100 as b0100, cc.NAME as name, cc.SEX as sex, cc.CSRQ as csrq, orp.WORK_UNIT as workUnit, orp.INCUMBENCY_STATUS as incumbencyStatus, orp.POST as post, cc.ZJLX as zjlx, cc.ZJHM as zjhm, cc.YXQZ as yxqz, cc.CARD_STATUS as cardStatus, cc.SAVE_STATUS as saveStatus, cc.QFJG as qfjg, cc.QFRQ as qfrq, cc.CSDD as csdd from cf_certificate cc join oms_reg_procpersoninfo orp on cc.a0100 = orp.a0100 join oms_personinfo op on op.A0100 = orp.A0100
cc.zjhm like concat('%',#{zjhm},'%') and cc.name like concat('%',#{name},'%') and
order by csrq

select cc.ID as id, cc.A0100 as a0100, cc.NAME as name, org.SEX as sex, org.WORK_UNIT as workUnit, org.POST as post, org.INCUMBENCY_STATUS as incumbencyStatus, cc.ZJLX as zjlx, org.BIRTH_DATE_GB as birthDateGb from cf_certificate cc join oms_reg_procpersoninfo org on cc.a0100=org.a0100
cc.a0100=#{a0100} and

SELECT cc.ID as id, cc.A0100 AS a0100, cc.NAME AS name, cc.SEX AS sex, cc.CSRQ AS csrq, org.POST AS post, org.WORK_UNIT AS workUnit, cc.ZJLX AS zjlx, cc.ZJHM AS zjhm, cc.YXQZ AS yxqz, cc.ZJXS as zjxs, cc.CARD_STATUS AS cardStatus, cc.SAVE_STATUS AS saveStatus, cc.CABINET_NUM AS cabinetNum, cc.PLACE AS place, cc.QFJG AS qfjg, cc.QFRQ AS qfrq, cc.CSDD AS csdd, op.B0100 AS b0100, getTime FROM cf_certificate cc JOIN oms_reg_procpersoninfo org ON cc.A0100 = org.A0100 JOIN oms_personinfo as op on org.A0100 = op.A0100 left JOIN ( SELECT ocgt.GET_TIME as getTime, ocgt.ZJHM as hm FROM oms_cer_get_task AS ocgt join cf_certificate cc on cc.ZJHM = ocgt.ZJHM WHERE ocgt.ZJHM = cc.ZJHM ORDER BY ocgt.GET_TIME DESC LIMIT 1 ) AS ls ON hm = cc.ZJHM
op.B0100 in
#{item}
and
cc.ZJLX=#{zjlx} and cc.CARD_STATUS='1' and cc.SAVE_STATUS=#{saveStatus} and
cc.YXQZ between #{expiredQueryStartTime} and #{expiredQueryEndTime} and
select COUNTER_NUM from cf_certificate where id=#{id}
